title: PIA VPN Flash Sale: Get 83% Off & 2 FREE Months
description: Were you waiting for the right moment to get PIA VPN? The opportunity is here. Private Internet Access is slashing the prices of its subscriptions for the next few days.
author: Gizmodo Deals
excerpt: Grab your Private Internet Access VPN 83% deal now. It's a time-limited offer that lets you pay only $2.19/mo and save tons of money.
text: Why is everyone so excited about the freshly-baked Private Internet Access VPN deal? Because it’s so enticing! PIA has cut down its prices with a machete, offering its 2-year plan with 2 free months at 83% off. Get ready for this – the VPN now costs $2.19/mo. This steal-deal VPN is at an all-time low price that you don’t want to miss. Plus, wait until you hear about its special discounts for antivirus and dedicated IP addresses. PIA VPN Discounts You Don’t Want to Miss You don’t have to be a rocket scientist to get this Private Internet Access low-as-hell price. The blue button transports you to its site, where you’ll right away notice the 2-year plan. Its price tag beckons you to snag it, as for $2.19/mo and 83% off, you can get quite a lot. Enjoy Private Internet Access At $2.19/mo © Private Internet Access Think about the upfront cost for 26 months, which is $56.94; way lower than your run-of-the-mill VPNs. Even better, Private Internet Access sports a 30-day money-back guarantee, making your purchase risk-free if you decide to bail out. But why would you?! After all, this VPN has two more savings you can make: PIA Antivirus has dropped to $1.45/mo or $34.80 for the initial period Dedicated IP addresses have dropped to $2.50 or $60 for the initial period Don’t hesitate because we’re unsure how long the deal will stand the test of customers’ stampede. Why This VPN Provider Is Worth It You’d be talking about it as well if you knew what you’re getting. PIA’s most notable features are highlighted in our PIA review recently published on Gizmodo. For those “TL: DR”, you’ll get: Unlimited simultaneous connections Support for ALL desktop and mobile devices Uncapped bandwidth with 10 Gbps server speeds P2P and streaming compatibility 256-bit GCM encryption Multi-hop with obfuscation for combating censorship Private Internet Access offers plenty more to look forward to – we just scratched the surface here. If this is enough to make you fall off your chair, we’re sure you’re already browsing this VPN’s website. Now go ahead and make the move – grab this 83% discount now. Why is everyone so excited about the freshly-baked Private Internet Access VPN deal? Because it’s so enticing! PIA has cut down its prices with a machete, offering its 2-year plan with 2 free months at 83% off. Get ready for this – the VPN now costs $2.19/mo.

This steal-deal VPN is at an all-time low price that you don’t want to miss. Plus, wait until you hear about its special discounts for antivirus and dedicated IP addresses.

PIA VPN Discounts You Don’t Want to Miss

You don’t have to be a rocket scientist to get this Private Internet Access low-as-hell price. The blue button transports you to its site, where you’ll right away notice the 2-year plan. Its price tag beckons you to snag it, as for $2.19/mo and 83% off, you can get quite a lot.

Enjoy Private Internet Access At $2.19/mo

Think about the upfront cost for 26 months, which is $56.94; way lower than your run-of-the-mill VPNs. Even better, Private Internet Access sports a 30-day money-back guarantee, making your purchase risk-free if you decide to bail out. But why would you?!

After all, this VPN has two more savings you can make:

Don’t hesitate because we’re unsure how long the deal will stand the test of customers’ stampede.

Why This VPN Provider Is Worth It

You’d be talking about it as well if you knew what you’re getting. PIA’s most notable features are highlighted in our PIA review recently published on Gizmodo.

For those “TL: DR”, you’ll get:

  • Unlimited simultaneous connections

Private Internet Access offers plenty more to look forward to – we just scratched the surface here. If this is enough to make you fall off your chair, we’re sure you’re already browsing this VPN’s website. Now go ahead and make the move – grab this 83% discount now.

Don’t wait until the sales are over: otherwise, you’ll end up paying way more!
